feedback: All 9 acceptance criteria validated successfully. 37 automated tests passed across 3 test suites. Code review found no blocking issues. Ready for merge.

iteration_history.summary: Documentation consolidation partially complete: all 9 acceptance criteria passed, but 8 broken internal links found across 2 files (README.md and docs/performance.md). Code review missed link validation. Fixes are straightforward: update old filenames (IMPLEMENTATION_NOTES.md, PERFORMANCE.md) to new paths (docs/implementation-notes.md, docs/performance.md) in 2 files, 8 total line changes required. Current pass rate: 20/22 tests (90.9%).

Blocking issue found: tests/test_performance_documentation.rs contains 35+ references to old PERFORMANCE.md path instead of docs/performance.md. This breaks test validation despite documentation consolidation being structurally correct. Update all path references in test file and re-run tests to confirm all 37 tests pass.
